definition: bad/spoiled/broken/to break down/(suffix) to the utmost

sentences.english: The evil pirate grinned wickedly down at them, gesturing grandly with his cutlass.
sentences.chinese: 邪惡海盜笑壞透了他們，指着他的彎刀隆重。

sentences.english: The Big Seven worst habits of communication are bad enough when they happen occasionally.
sentences.chinese: 這七大最壞的溝通習慣只要偶爾發生都會壞透了。
這是一個壞透了的夜晚。

sentences.english: So, I mean, the feeling was very bad, very frightening.
sentences.chinese: 我是說，當時的感覺壞透了，很恐怖。

sentences.english: Look at how bad our economy was to the core before it flew apart.
sentences.chinese: 我們的經濟在崩潰前已經壞透了。

sentences.english: Morals today are just plain terrible!
sentences.chinese: 現在的道德心真是壞透了。
